workflow.name: Website downtime monitoring with smart alerts via Telegram & Email
workflow.description:
Get ==Instant== Alerts When Your Website Goes Down ‚Äî Using ==n8n== as ==Website Downtime Checker Robot==

If you manage websites (your own or clients‚Äô), downtime alerts are critical.‚Ä®But most monitoring tools create alert fatigue ‚Äî ==emails for every tiny hiccup==, even 30‚Äì60 second outages.
This setup shows how to use n8n as a smart uptime monitor:‚Ä®
‚úÖ No extra subscriptions‚Ä®
‚úÖ No false-positive spam‚Ä®
‚úÖ Alerts only for real downtime‚Ä®
‚úÖ Optional instant phone notifications

Why Use n8n for Website Monitoring?
Traditional tools like Uptime Robot become limiting or expensive as you scale.
With n8n, you get:
* Full control over alert logic
* Custom timing & thresholds
* No forced notification rules
* One tool for uptime and other automations
You decide when, how, and why alerts are sent.

**Quick Start:** 
Free n8n Website Monitoring Workflow
Get running in minutes:
* Use the prebuilt n8n template
* Sign up for n8n Cloud or self-host for free
* Set your schedule (default: hourly)
* Add the websites you want to monitor


**Key Setting** (Important)
Wait time: ==300 seconds (5 minutes)==
>Recommended*

‚Ä®If a site goes down, the workflow waits before alerting.‚Ä®
‚û°Ô∏è Short hiccups = ignored‚Ä®
‚û°Ô∏è Real outages = ==alerted==

**How to Test & Use**
1. Activate the workflow‚Ä®Toggle it on ‚Äî monitoring runs automatically.
2. Test instantly‚Ä®Add a fake or non-existent URL and run the workflow.‚Ä®After the wait period, you‚Äôll receive an alert.
3. Stay organized‚Ä®Alerts arrive cleanly in your inbox‚Ä®(Tip: pair with an AI email labeling workflow for color-coded alerts)

Get Critical Alerts on Your Phone (Telegram)
Email is fine ‚Äî but critical sites need instant mobile alerts.
Best option: Telegram bots
* Free
* Fast
* No extra APIs or subscriptions


How It Works
* Create a Telegram bot via BotFather
* Add the bot token & chat ID to n8n
* Receive downtime alerts instantly on your phone
No missed notifications. No noise.


**FAQ**
* Can I monitor unlimited sites?‚Ä®
> ==Yes== ‚Äî just add more URLs.

* What about short downtime (seconds)?
> Filtered out by the 5-minute wait.

* Do I need a paid n8n plan?‚Ä®
> ==No.== Self-hosting is ==free==, and this works on free plans.

* Why not SMS or WhatsApp?‚Ä®
> **Telegram** is ==faster, simpler, and doesn‚Äôt require paid APIs.==



üì© **Contact Me**

If you have any questions, ideas to share, or would like to collaborate on a project, feel free to reach out. I‚Äôm always open to meaningful discussions, feedback, and new opportunities.

üîó ==Connect with me==
* [Facebook](https://facebook.com/the.mubiin)

* [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/mubiiin/)


üí¨ You‚Äôre welcome to send me a message on any platform, and I‚Äôll get back to you as soon as possible.

From: n8n uptime

parameters.content:
# Instructions; Telegram bot

1. **Create your Telegram bot**  
   1. Open Telegram and chat with **@BotFather**.  
   2. Send `/newbot` and follow prompts to pick a bot **name** and **username** (must end in ‚Äúbot‚Äù).  
   3. Copy the **bot token** returned by BotFather.

2. **Start a conversation & get the chat ID**  
   1. In Telegram, find your bot by username (e.g. `@my_alert_bot`) and send it a message (e.g. `/start`).  
   2. In your browser, visit:  
      ```
      https://api.telegram.org/bot<Token>/getUpdates
      ```  
   3. Locate `"chat":{"id":123456789}` in the JSON and copy that number as your **chat_id**.

3. **Add Telegram settings in n8n**  
   - In your workflow, click on the **Telegram** node.  
   - Under **Credentials**, select **Create New** ‚Üí **Telegram Bot API**, and paste your **bot token**.  
   - In the **Config node‚Äôs** **telegram_chat_id** field, enter the numeric **chat_id** you retrieved.

That‚Äôs it! Your n8n workflow now sends notifications via both Gmail and Telegram.

## Made by:
 # Muntasir Mubin
### The Founder & CEO of WebDextro Ltd, a distinguished Web & App development company based in the United Kingdom.

üìß mubin@webdextro.org
üìû [Follow on Facebook](https://fb.me/the.mubiin)
üíº [Add me on Linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/mubiiin/)

parameters.html:
Website Offline Alert

Hello {{Recipient Name}},

We wanted to let you know that {{YourWebsite.com}} is currently unavailable. Our team has been notified and is investigating the issue.

Incident: Website unreachable
Detected at: {{YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM}}
Estimated fix: {{If known, e.g. ~30 minutes}} or "Under investigation"

We apologize for the inconvenience. You can reply to this email or contact our support:

Phone: +880XXXXXXXXXX
Email: user@example.com

Check Status Page

Thank you,
The {{YourCompanyName}} Team

This is an automated message. Please do not reply to this address.
[ALERT] {{YourWebsite.com}} is currently unavailable. Detected at {{YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM}}. Contact: user@example.com
parameters.subject: Website Down

user.name: Muntasir Mubin
user.bio: Muntasir Mubin is the Founder & CEO of WebDextro Ltd, a distinguished Web & App development company based in the United Kingdom. With a strong passion for technology, he has established himself as a skilled Web & App Developer. His expertise, combined with his innovative mindset, has enabled him to create exceptional digital solutions for clients worldwide. His dedication and commitment to excellence make him a highly sought-after professional in the industry.
